text: It's just an array of row ids of that foreign table (Quick tip: populate table manually with some demo content, fetch rows via API and see how everything is structured)
Yeah, everyone struggles with that at the beginning, I think that in current docs you can figure this out only from this example:

Hi guys,
I am trying to extract data from 2 tables but can't find 2 columns. The column "associations_associatedCompanyIds" in table "deals" and "identity_profiles" in table "contacts". Could you be so kind and tell me whether it was renamed or deleted? Thank you!
UPDATE - Probably we don't use the second one (so it's not important) but the first one we do...
Hey Monika, please check the docs: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/deals>
there is an associations endpoint on the very top
example response for v3 endpoint - id in results is the value you are looking for

Hello, anyone has a workaround for the meetings rolling weeks limitation? we would like to limit that only for the next two days.
maybe some front-end script we can use to control this?

Thanks
Oh nice, so you just did have your timestamp in epoc millisecond?
I was using Unix epoch without milliseconds which wasn’t causing an error, just returned 0 records
Once I switched to milliseconds it was fine
Nice, looks like I'll finish it tomorrow. Thank you very much! :star-struck:
